title: Riot just in it for the $$$$$

embed.description: Welcome to the League of Legends Wiki, the wiki about League of Legends that anyone can edit! We currently have 2,198 articles about the free-to-play action RTS video game created by Riot Games.

body: Clearly Riot doesnt care about giving  older champs skins anymore, its all about giving the most played champs skins again and again just to make $$$. Draven is just about to get his 3rd skin in under a year....really Riot

replies.body: Draven isn't even played a lot. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Most played champs. 

Draven. 

Pick one.
ok well if you wont riot to make skins for {{champion:44}} they will but note that riot will have to start charging cash to play lol

Becuase {{champion:119}} 's skin actually makes sense since he adores himself...

1.{{champion:57}} wasn't played much, yet he's getting one too.

I'd be more inclined to complain about the "Beast Hunter" skins being a money grab than this new skin.

"Draven Draven" makes sense. Because like "Mundo Mundo", these 2 champions are well known for saying their own names.
